Projects.title: To-Do & Note Web Apps
desc: A suite of productivity web applications built with Next.js, designed to simplify task and note management. The To-Do Web App enables users to create, update, and delete tasks, while the Note Web App allows users to efficiently manage personal notes with features for adding, editing, and deleting content. Both apps are fully responsive, ensuring seamless functionality across devices. Developed with modern web technologies and deployed on Vercel, these projects highlight expertise in creating dynamic and user-friendly applications.

Projects.title: AI-Driven Food Website with Next.js
desc: This food website is a modern platform built using Next.js, ShadCN for sleek components, Lucide for icons, and ChatGPT for AI-driven functionality. Next.js ensures fast performance and smooth navigation, while ShadCN and Lucide provide a polished and visually appealing design. ChatGPT adds intelligence with features like personalized food suggestions and dynamic recipe ideas, enhancing user interactivity. Deployed on Vercel, the site is globally accessible, fast, and scalable, ensuring a seamless experience for all users. Fully responsive and optimized for various devices, the website incorporates intuitive features like search, filtering, and clickable elements, showcasing expertise in modern web development.
